summary: I made a companion, who is named Desmond. This is my first mod and it pretty much a test. I hope you guys enjoy, and leave feedback please! He can be found in The Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.
descriptionHtml: This is my very first mod. It is vey simple, as i followed a tutorial from youtube. The mod adds a follower named Desmond that can be found in The Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.
author: Heath Bailey
